(Simplified: 鲢)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 連 indicates the sound; 魚 (fish) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 魚 [ yú ] fish
    • 連 [ lián ] to join, to connect; continuous; even
①(鰱魚)頭小鱗細，肉可食，是重要的淡水魚類之一。亦稱“鰱子”、“白鰱”。
鰱魚 [ lián yú ]: silver carp

鰱字的基本解释

鰱
lián
见“鲢”。

鰱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lián］
［《廣韻》力延切，平仙，來。］
“鲢1”的繁体字。
鱼名。鱼纲鲤科。体侧扁，鳞细，背部青黑色，腹部白色。为中国主要的淡水养殖鱼类之一。也称鱮。

鰱字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鰱； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1476第26
【唐韻】力延切【集韻】陵延切，?音連。【說文】魚名。【博雅】鱮也。【陸璣·草木蟲魚疏】鱮，徐州人謂之鰱。【郭璞·江賦】鯪鯉鰩鰱。又【正字通】鰫魚似鰱。俗呼黑鰱。

Silver carp
Basic explanation of words
Silver carp
lián
See "silver carp".
Silver carp
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lián］
["Guangyun" Li Yanqie, Pingxian, come. ]
Traditional characters for "鲢1".
The name of the fish. Fish class Cyprinidae. The side of the body is flat, with thin scales, the back is bluish-black, and the abdomen is white. It is one of the main freshwater farmed fishes in China. Also called 鱮.
Silver carp
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鲢; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1476 Page 26
【Tang Yun】Li Yanqie 【Ji Yun】Ling Yanqie, and the sound is connected. [Said the text] The name of the fish. [Bo Ya] Yan Ye. 【Lu Ji·Grass, Insects, Fishes, and Fishes】Cep, Xuzhou people call silver carp. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] Dace, Carp, Carp. Also 【Zhengzitong】The silver carp resembles silver carp. Commonly called black silver carp.
